message: Let's start with a fair deal, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work our way down from there if you're not happy.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This offer won't be as generous in later rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 60/40 split is still too much in your favor.  Let's meet in the middle at 55/45.  If we keep going, inflation will only hurt us both.
